the idea of a Teen Idol show in the past, The X Factor is going there from the start and beyond. Singers aged 12 and up are welcome to audition. There is no upper age limit. I like the idea that a 12-year old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, Simon Cowell said in a statement. "I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent."
